title: GMC Layoffs Happen as Part of Profit Drive - The Detroit News

scene_plan.wide_context: A panoramic shot of the GMC Warren Technical Center, with workers in various stages of departure. A sign reads 'Automotive Industry News.'

scene_plan.data_overlay: Text overlay with the number '200+' and date, indicating hundreds laid off at Warren Technical Center recently due to business conditions. Credit: The Detroit News
